Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This disorder is reminiscent of another rare condition , the Stuve - Wiedemann syndrome ( SWS ) , which comprises campomelia at birth with skeletal dysplasia , contractures , and early death .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Stuve-Wiedemann syndrome (SWS) |
| campomelia at birth |
| skeletal dysplasia |
| contractures |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Stuve-Wiedemann syndrome (SWS) |
| skeletal dysplasia |
| contractures |

Note: "disorder" and "rare condition" are not specific diseases, but rather general terms used to describe the context of the mentioned conditions. Therefore, they have been excluded from the table.
